abilityEffect: If you have Uxie and Mesprit in play, the attack cost of each of your opponent's Basic Pokémon's attacks is [C] more. You can't use more than 1 Downer Material Poké-Body each turn.

effect.en: During your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't attach any Special Energy cards from his or her hand to any of his or her Pokémon.
